show_desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Yoklugunda
episode_desc: Mecnun forgets Leyla's birthday. He wants to find a meaningful present for his apology.

title: Makine
episode_desc: Erdal Bakkal finds a machine under his house. This machine says that the end of the world is coming and the crew only have twenty four hours to stop it.
show_desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Gelecek
episode_desc: Leyla and Mecnun find themselves in 4000 after the machine explodes. The crew travel to future in order to find them but they go to wrong year. They are in 3000. In both years, there is a man called the shadow who controls the world.

title: Anne
episode_desc: Iskender has a heart attack. Mecnun starts driving taxi instead of his dad. He meets a mysterious old woman.
show_desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Sans
episode_desc: Hidayet's mother and Hidayet start living together. There is a girl in the neighborhood and she doesn't speak at all. She just smiles and brings luck to person she is smiling to.
show_desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Fedakarlik
episode_desc: Iskender loses his house because of his debts. They can't find anywhere to stay so they go to a park. Erdal Bakkal steals Dosto's laptop. Hidayet's mother try to know Leyla better.
show_desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Seviyorsan Üzme, Sevmiyorsan Oynama
episode_desc: Erdal, Yavuz and Metin are in madhouse. They escape from there and start rebellion against sanity and its supporters. Leyla finds a job but she gets fired because of Mecnun. Iskender is sick and tired of troubles Mecnun makes for Leyla.
show_desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Kill Bilal
episode_desc: Mecnun breaks up with Leyla and he wants to find a new girlfriend in order to forget her. Erdal Bakkal continues his rebellion against sanity. Hidayet's mother chases a man called Bilal.
show_desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Tom Waits
episode_desc: Hidayet is in coma. The doctor tries everything to save him. Leyla makes a big deal with a company. If she can organize a concert of Tom Waits, she will get lots of money and this means she can save her own company.
show_desc: Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

title: Kahramanlik
episode_desc: Mecnun thinks that Leyla woos Hidayet because everyone believes Hidayet is a hero. Mecnun wants to prove that he is hero too and he saved the world before. Arda's father has some bad plans to take control of the world.

title: Kireçburnu'nun 100. Kurtulus Yili
episode_desc: Hidayet is in coma again. The doctor needs papers from a century ago to heal Hidayet. Menun travels back in time in order to get these papers from the doctor's grandfather before he destroys them.

title: Para Kazanmak

title: Falci
